resources.string: Talented Software Engineer with 5 years of hands-on experience in leading projects through all phases of software development life cycle while improving quality and performance. Effective team leader who evaluates and analyzes requirements to ensure projects meet customer requirements and needs. Skilled in implementing technologies such as Java, Apache, Tomcat, Angular, Bootstrap, MySQL, Postgre, Eclipse, IntelliJ, NetBeans, and Atom Spring and Hibernate.Talented Software Engineer with 5 years of hands-on experience in leading projects through all phases of software development life cycle while improving quality and performance. Effective team leader who evaluates and analyzes requirements to ensure projects meet customer requirements and needs. Skilled in implementing technologies such as Java, Apache, Tomcat, Angular, Bootstrap, MySQL, Postgre, Eclipse, IntelliJ, NetBeans, and Atom Spring and Hibernate.

Talented Software Engineer with 5 years of hands-on experience in leading projects through all phases of software development life cycle while improving quality and performance.
